name: IoT for Electronics Starter
description: IoT for Electronics is an integrated end-to-end solution (made of multiple services and apps) that enables your apps to communicate with, control, analyze, and update connected electronics.

runtime.name: SDK for Node.js™
runtime.description: Quickly get started with SDK for Node.js™.

de.name: IoT for Electronics Starter
de.description: IoT for Electronics ist eine integrierte End-to-End-Lösung (bestehend aus mehrere Services und Apps), die es Ihnen ermöglicht, Apps zu verwenden, um mit verbundenen elektronischen Geräten zu kommunizieren und diese zu steuern, zu analyiseren und zu aktualisieren.

fr.name: IoT for Electronics Starter
fr.description: IoT for Electronics est une solution de bout en bout intégrée (composée de plusieurs services et applis) qui permet à vos applications de communiquer, de contrôler, d'analyser et de mettre à jour des périphériques électroniques.

it.name: IoT for Electronics Starter
it.description: IoT for Electronics è una soluzione end-to-end integrata (composta da più servizi ed app) che consente alle proprie app di comunicare, controllare, analizzare e ed aggiornare i dispositivi elettronici connessi.

es.name: IoT for Electronics Starter
es.description: IoT for Electronics es una solución total integrada (formada por varios servicios y aplicaciones) que permite a las aplicaciones comunicarse con los dispositivos electrónicos conectados para controlarlos, analizarlos y actualizarlos.

pt-br.name: IoT for Electronics Starter
pt-br.description: (PT-BR)IoT for Electronics is an integrated end-to-end solution (made of multiple services and apps) that enables your apps to communicate with, control, analyze, and update connected electronics.(PT-BR)

ja.name: IoT for Electronics Starter
ja.description: IoT for Electronics は、統合されたエンドツーエンド・ソリューションで、複数のサービスとアプリで構成されています。アプリによる接続済みの電子機器との通信や電子機器の制御、分析、更新を行うことができます。

ko.name: IoT for Electronics Starter
ko.description: IoT for Electronics는 사용자 앱이 연결된 전자 제품과 통신하고, 제어하며, 분석 및 업데이트할 수 있도록 지원하는(여러 서비스와 앱으로 구성된) 통합 엔드-투-엔드 솔루션입니다.

zh-Hans.name: IoT for Electronics Starter
zh-Hans.description: IoT for Electronics 是集成的端到端解决方案（由多个服务和应用组成），支持您的应用与互联的电子设备进行通信，并对其进行控制、分析和更新。

zh-Hant.name: IoT for Electronics Starter
zh-Hant.description: IoT for Electronics 是整合的端對端解決方案（由多個服務和應用程式構成），讓您的應用程式可以與連線電子裝置通訊，以及控制、分析和更新連線電子裝置。
